‚Ä¢ Open-Source Resources

üîµ 2. Operating Systems

  • MIT ‚Äî Operating Systems Engineering (6.828)
    https://pdos.csail.mit.edu/6.828/
    Best course for learning OS internals, xv6 OS, kernels & scheduling.

  • Linux From Scratch
    https://www.linuxfromscratch.org/
    Build your own Linux system from the ground up.

üîµ 3. Machine Learning & AI

  • TensorFlow Official
    https://www.tensorflow.org/
    Open-source platform for ML & neural networks.

  • PyTorch
    https://pytorch.org/
    Research-friendly deep learning ecosystem.

  • Fast.ai Courses
    https://www.fast.ai/
    Free, practical deep learning courses.

üîµ 4. Distributed Computing

  • Apache Hadoop
    https://hadoop.apache.org/
    Framework for distributed storage & large-scale data processing.

  • Apache Spark
    https://spark.apache.org/
    Fast cluster computing system for big data analytics.

üîµ 5. High-Performance Computing (HPC)

  • OpenMPI
    https://www.open-mpi.org/
    Industrial standard library for distributed scientific computing.

  • NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit
    https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-zone
    GPU-accelerated computing SDK for scientific applications.
